name: God of Stickfights
description:
Fight in unique battles, discover relics of immense power, and evolve within battle to claim your well-deserved place as the God Of Stickfights.

ROGUE-LIKE? FIGHTING? ROGUEFIGHTS!


This game fused fighting games and roguelikes together to make the best Stickman game i could have ever created.

PULVERIZE YOUR FRIENDS WITH DIVINE TRANSFORMATION


Unleash your potential and take on the world using your divine form, which will transform you into a completely different (and even more op) character for as long as your stamina bar lasts.

EVOLVE WITHIN BATTLE


Ascend to the heavens by overcoming your limits to evolve your stickman during the battle, how do you achieve this? well, that's a well-kept secret... je

EXPERIENCIE UNBELIEVABLE STICKMAN BATTLES


Enter the battlefield to experiencie the feeling of being a Over-Powered Stickman in an Animation from the old good times. (or like you are an anime MC)

FEATURES


• Dynamic deck building: Choose your cards wisely! Each match is unique, with the roguelike mechanics discover new builds that will make every battle feel fresh and exciting.

• Unbelievable spectacle: Completely handmade animations that will make you feel like in a stickman animation from the golden age of internet (or like you are an anime MC).

• Divine form: Every character has 2 complemently different Movesets, uses its incredible power at any time during the battle to destroy your rivals and show them who's boss.

• Good online experience guaranteed: Online servers powered by Hybrid Rollback Netcode and Private Dedicated Servers. This means that you will be able to destroy and outsmart naive stickmans across the world.

• Easy control scheme: The classic fighting games prevent you from doing it cool combos with excessively difficult controls, that's why in this game all the controls are easy to learn, ¡In the whole game theres no one Motion-Input!
